meanings.definition: A person who makes detailed technical plans or drawings.
meanings.sent1: The draughtsman carefully sketched out the blueprint for the new building.
meanings.sent2: The talented draughtsman created a beautiful illustration of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The draughtsman's drawing of a flying pig brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a draughtsman, mapping out the intricate details of her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The draughtsman's precision in drawing the gears made the machine come to life.

meanings.definition: A person skilled in drawing or sketching.
meanings.sent1: As a young draughtsman, he practiced drawing every day to improve his skills.
meanings.sent2: The talented draughtsman effortlessly captured the essence of the model in his sketch.
meanings.sent3: The draughtsman's doodles on the margins of the paper turned into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a draughtsman's pencil, outlining the beauty of the world.
meanings.sent5: The draughtsman's hand moved swiftly, bringing to life the characters on the page.
